de.dennis_kempf.squidward

Interface Transition.Guard<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - event type that may be checked
    Enclosing interface:
    Transition<T>

    public static interface Transition.Guard<T>
    Guard which has to be satisfied for an transition to be taken.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Transition.Guard<java.lang.Object> always(boolean result)
      Returns a guard that always answers with the same value.
      boolean check(T event)
      Checks whether the provided event satisfies the guard.
      static Transition.Guard<java.lang.Object> fail()
      Returns a guard that will always fail.
      static Transition.Guard<java.lang.Object> pass()
      Returns a guard that will always pass.

    • Method Detail

      • always

        static Transition.Guard<java.lang.Object> always(boolean result)
        Returns a guard that always answers with the same value.
        Parameters:
        result - to be used as an answer
        Returns:
        guard with a static answer

      • pass

        static Transition.Guard<java.lang.Object> pass()
        Returns a guard that will always pass.
        Returns:
        always passing guard

      • fail

        static Transition.Guard<java.lang.Object> fail()
        Returns a guard that will always fail.
        Returns:
        always failing guard

      • check

        boolean check(T event)
        Checks whether the provided event satisfies the guard.
        Parameters:
        event - to be checked
        Returns:
        true, if satisfied, otherwise false
